entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Muncho Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 11 March 2023
